Description:
Detects tampering with EventLog service "file" key. In order to change the default location of an Evtx file. This technique is used to tamper with log collection and alerting

Author: D3F7A5105
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential EventLog File Location Tampering
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((target_object like '%\system\currentcontrolset\services\eventlog\%' and target_object like '%\file') and  not details like '%\system32\winevt\logs\%')
